EmailTemplate.name: 201904_Global_Email_GDT_B787_mih.201904_Global_Email_GDT_A320&737_mih
EmailTemplate.subject: Exclusive early access to discounted Boeing 787 Parts
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> <[[https://www.godirecttrade.com/?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_content=marketo&utm_term=hat_a320_a737]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=customer}},
As an existing Honeywell customer, you get advanced notice of promotions at our online parts trading platform, GoDirect Trade <[[https://www.godirecttrade.com/?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_content=marketo&utm_term=hat_787]]>.
We have just added Boeing 787 parts at up to 95% off! Click the button below to view parts with pricing, product images, and quality documentation:
SHOP 787 PARTS AT UP TO 95% OFF <[[https://www.godirecttrade.com/editor-s-choice.html?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_content=marketo&utm_term=hat_787]]>
In addition to the 787 promo, GoDirect Trade has the following promotions:
- 90% Fire sale <[[https://www.godirecttrade.com/fire-sale.html?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_content=marketo&utm_term=hat_787]]> - close to 3,000 parts at clearance prices - 60% Price drop <[[https://www.godirecttrade.com/promotional-product.html?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_content=marketo&utm_term=hat_787]]> - almost 200 parts for Airbus A320 and Boeing 737 - A320 Dismantlement <[[https://www.godirecttrade.com/dismantlement.html?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_content=marketo&utm_term=hat_787]]> - 300 parts fresh off an A320 at great prices
Happy shopping!
